content:
i. Investigate the effect of digitalization of tax administration on cadaster registration of assets
ii. Examine the effect of digitalization of tax administration on self-assessment
iii. Investigate the effect of digitalization of tax administration on tax filling and tax authority assessment 
iv. Investigate the impact of digitalization of tax administration on compliance enforcement through Audit and Investigation
vi. Investigate the effect of digitalization of tax administration on tax appeal tribunal judgement
vi. Investigate the effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance monitoring
